price: Kuma lalle, ne waɗanda suka kãfirta sunã yin kamar su kãyar da kai sabõ da kallonsu (kallon mãmãki), a lokacin da suke jin karãtun Alƙur'ãni, kuma sunã cẽwa, "Lalle ne shi mahaukaci ne!"
arabic: وَإِن يَكَادُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَيُزۡلِقُونَكَ بِأَبۡصَٰرِهِمۡ لَمَّا سَمِعُواْ ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُۥ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yakādu alladhīna kafarū layuz'liqūnaka bi-abṣārihim lammā samiʿū al-dhik'ra wayaqūlūna innahu lamajnūnun
